price: But whoever was blind [from the truth][66] in this life will be even blinder in the Hereafter and further astray from the right way.
arabic: وَمَن كَانَ فِي هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَعۡمَىٰ فَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: [66] i.e., refused to see the truth.
